text: Arnold Rikli (1823-1906) was a healer. He proposed various therapies, mostly based on exposing the body to sun and air (called Sun tanning, preferably done while naked). He is one of the forefathers of a movement called naturism today. Category:1823 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Swiss people Category:Oberaargau (administrative district)
title: Arnold Rikli
